text: Avalon Theater or Theatre may refer to: * Avalon Theater (Catalina), California; now known as Catalina Casino * Avalon Theatre, Easton, Maryland * Avalon Theater (Brooklyn), New York * Avalon Theater (Larimore, North Dakota), listed on the National Register of Historic Places * Avalon Theatre (Portland, Oregon), a movie theatre * Avalon Theatre (Washington, D.C.), listed on the National Register of Historic Places Category:Buildings and structures disambiguation pages
title: Avalon Theater
